title: Colour deviation
subTitle: The colours look drastically different from the proof file the customer saw online.
action: Open both customers file and the cPDF and compare.

question.text: Colours changed from customers file to cPDF?

questions.title: Colours changed from customers file to cPDF?

summaries.title: Solution
summaries.description: Send a side conversation to Artwork_Complaints inbox with the artwork complaints macro.

options.action:
Place the customers picture next to the cPDF and compare.
Compare colour values in acrobat if the picture is clear.

question.text:
Visually over 10%?
IF DOUBT: Check the Colour Profiles, Check the colour values in Acrobat (Output Preview), Ask for more evidence, Check with supplier, Check with Quinten, Rafa or Miguel.
What type of order is this?

questions.title: Colours changed from customers file to cPDF?

summaries.title: Solution
summaries.description: We need to review these case by case. Take into account such factors as: Priority Client, amount of orders total, amount of prior complaints, amount spent total, purchase price vs. customer price.

options.text: Purchase price is under 150 or New CMR

solution.title: Colour deviation
solution.action:
Pick one of the following resolutions based on type of customer 
Add to an internal note and forward to CS_Urgent
PMS colours needed if reprinting on PMS
Warn customer of risk of repeated colour deviation when reprinting.

questions.title: Colours changed from customers file to cPDF?
Purchase price is under 150 or New CMR

summaries.title: Solution
summaries.description: The colours do not deviate enough for us to validate the complaint. If precise colours are required, we can offer a discount on a PMS order. For a loyal or new customer we can offer a discount on the current order.

summaries.title: What to tell the customer (NEW)
summaries.description: The colours are within 10% of the approved proof, so we cannot validate the complaint. In CMYK printing, colours can deviate due to factors such as ink quality, paper type, calibration issues and environmental conditions. We are happy to offer a discount on this product with PMS printing to ensure the correct colors are printed.

summaries.title: What to tell the customer (RETURNING)
summaries.description:
In CMYK printing, colours can deviate due to factors such as ink quality, paper type, calibration issues and environmental conditions. We are happy to offer a discount on a PMS printed product or a one time full reprint as you are a valued customer. 
If you opt for the reprint, please be aware that we can not guarantee the colours match the proof as the risks mentioned remain. If a reprint is not possible anymore within the timeframe, we can refund the order if the product is returned to us.

summaries.title: Log in Presta
summaries.description: Complaint Department: Customer goodwill Complaint Type: Color deviation under 10%

solution.title: Colour deviation
solution.action:
File the complaint in Presta. 
Same file can be used for reprint

questions.title: Colours changed from customers file to cPDF?

summaries.title: Solution
summaries.description: The supplier mixed the inks incorrectly and they deviated over 10% from the cPDF. A reprint can be processed with the same file as approved. If a reprint is directed to the same supplier, create a ticket to traffic prior to production to ensure the same mistake is not repeated

summaries.title: What to tell the customer
summaries.description:
The colours have deviated over 10%, this could have been caused because of multiple reasons: Ink quality, paper type, calibration issues, environmental factors, human error. As this is outside of our acceptable margins we would like to offer to reprint the product with the same file. 
If no time for a reprint, could you use the current printed product at a discount?

summaries.title: Log in Presta
summaries.description: Complaint Department: Supplier - Quality Wrong Complaint Type: Deviating Colours

options.action: Check the log in the DTP tab and look for a 'DTP Message - Colours FIXED' warning.
Automatic: Open the DTP Tab in Presta & check 'AutoCheck Artwork' box. Manual: 'Open the DTP Tab in Presta, check 'Attachments' box, and see agent name under 'Uploaded by.

File the complaint in Presta. 
If a reprint is required, make sure to warn the customer of a possible deviation

solution.title: Colour deviation
solution.action:
File the complaint in Presta. 
If a reprint is required, make sure to warn the customer of a possible deviation

questions.title: Colours changed from customers file to cPDF?

summaries.title: Solution
summaries.description: We altered the colours from the original design but did not warn the customer, this indicates a lack of attention on our end. We can reprint with a CMYK / PMS file from the customer or they can use the current order at a discount.

summaries.title: What to tell the customer
summaries.description:
The colours in your file were altered to conform to the printing technique ordered, but we failed to warn you regarding this change. As we can not print the colours you have uploaded, we suggest using the current product at a discount. 
Alternitivaly we are happy to offer to reprint with a colour corrected file.

summaries.title: Log in Presta
summaries.description: Complaint Department: Artwork - Manual Checked Complaint Type: Agent mistake - No Warning Given

solution.title: Colour deviation
solution.action:
File the complaint in Presta. 
If a reprint is required, make sure to warn the customer of a possible deviation

questions.title: Colours changed from customers file to cPDF?

summaries.title: Solution
summaries.description: Autocheck failed to send a warning regarding the colour change. Since the customer was not informed we can reprint with a fixed CMYK / PMS file from the customer or they can use the current order at a discount.

summaries.title: What to tell the customer
summaries.description:
The colours in your file were altered to conform to the printing technique ordered, but we failed to warn you regarding this change. As we can not print the colours you have uploaded, we suggest using the current product at a discount. 
Alternitivaly we are happy to offer to reprint with a colour corrected file.

summaries.title: Log in Presta
summaries.description: Complaint Department: Artwork - Automatic Checked Complaint Type: Autocheck - No Warning Given

options.action: Open Acrobat and find 'Output Preview'. Check for PANTONE colours under 'Spot Plates'

options.action: Ask the customer for a picture of a product on which they previously printed this PMS colour.

solution.action: Ask the customer for a picture of a product on which they previously printed this PMS colour.

questions.title: Colours changed from customers file to cPDF?

summaries.title: Solution
summaries.description: Send a side conversation to Artwork_Complaints inbox with the artwork complaints macro.

question.text: Does the printed product match the colour in PANTONE Formula Guide?

solution.title: Colour deviation
solution.action:
File the complaint in Presta.  
Check if the PMS composition is possible at the current supplier 
Check if the file is correct for type of paper (check Coated/Uncoated).

questions.title: Colours changed from customers file to cPDF?
Does the printed product match the colour in PANTONE Formula Guide?

summaries.title: Solution
summaries.description: PMS colours are premade and should always have the same colour. If a colour deviation is apparent on a PMS order it means the supplier did not follow the correct mixture. You can reprint with the same file. If a reprint is directed to the same supplier, create a ticket to traffic prior to production to ensure the same mistake is not repeated.

summaries.title: What to tell the customer
summaries.description:
It seems we printed alternative PMS colours to those approved on the print proof. We apologise for this oversight and want to rectify this mistake by reprinting your order with the correct PMS colours.  
If you can't use the reprint because it will be too late, I can offer you a refund on this order.

summaries.title: Log in Presta
summaries.description: Complaint Department: Supplier - Quality Wrong Complaint Type: Deviating Colours

question.text: What type of order is this?

questions.title: Colours changed from customers file to cPDF?
Does the printed product match the colour in PANTONE Formula Guide?

summaries.title: Solution
summaries.description: We need to review these case by case. Take into account such factors as: Priority Client, amount of orders total, amount of prior complaints, amount spent total, purchase price vs. customer price.

options.text: Purchase price is under 150 or New CMR

solution.title: Colour deviation
solution.action:
File and finish the complaint in Presta. 
Select one of the following outcomes based on customer type
Warn that a reprint would have the same result unless printed on a different product.

questions.title: Colours changed from customers file to cPDF?
Does the printed product match the colour in PANTONE Formula Guide?
Purchase price is under 150 or New CMR

summaries.title: Solution
summaries.description: The colours match the PANTONE colour book so cannot validate the complaint. The customer might compare to a previous order. We can offer a discount or alter the PMS colour in our cPDF.

summaries.title: What to tell the customer (NEW)
summaries.description:
The PANTONE colour printed matches the mixture stipulated in the PANTONE Formula Guide, so no mistake was made during printing. 
As you are a valued customer and we would like to rectify this situation we would like to offer a reprint with a corrected PMS colour, for this we would need you to compare a previously printed product to its matching PANTONE mixture in the PANTONE Formula Guide, mind the paper choice. 
Inform us of the corrected PANTONE mixture and we can alter the file for reprint.

summaries.title: What to tell the customer (RETURNING)
summaries.description: The PANTONE colour printed matches the mixture stipulated in the PANTONE Formula Guide, so no mistake was made during printing. As you are a valued customer we offer to discount the current order with 10%, alternatively we could send you this discount as a voucher for future use.

summaries.title: Log in Presta
summaries.description: Complaint Department: Customer goodwill Complaint Type: Color deviation under 10%
